name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer but not guaranteed to be a number)
description: Description: ID of the scheduled status in the database.

name: scheduled_at
description: Description: The timestamp for when the status will be posted.

name: params
description: Description: The parameters that were used when scheduling the status, to be used when the status is posted.

name: params[text]
description: Description: Text to be used as status content.

name: params[poll]
description: Description: Poll to be attached to the status.

name: params[poll][options[]]
description: Description: The poll options to be used.

name: params[poll][expires_in]
description: Description: How many seconds the poll should last before closing.

name: params[poll][multiple]
description: Description: Whether the poll allows multiple choices.

name: params[poll][hide_totals]
description: Description: Whether the poll should hide total votes until after voting has ended.

name: params[media_ids]
description: Description: IDs of the MediaAttachments that will be attached to the status.

name: params[sensitive]
description: Description: Whether the status will be marked as sensitive.

name: params[spoiler_text]
description: Description: The text of the content warning or summary for the status.

name: params[visibility]
description: Description: The visibility that the status will have once it is posted.

name: params[in_reply_to_id]
description: Description: ID of the Status that will be replied to.

name: params[language]
type: Type: NULLABLE String (ISO 639-1 two-letter language code)
description: Description: The language that will be used for the status.

name: params[application_id]
description: Description: ID of the Application that posted the status.

name: params[scheduled_at]
description: Description: When the status will be scheduled. This will be null because the status is only scheduled once.

name: params[idempotency]
description: Description: Idempotency key to prevent duplicate statuses.

name: params[with_rate_limit]
description: Description: Whether the status should be rate limited .

name: media_attachments
description: Description: Media that will be attached when the status is posted.
